#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>

int main()
{
    char s[200],s1[200];
    int i=0;
    
    int t=0,m=-1;
    scanf("%d\n",&t);
    
    while(t--)
    {
           gets(s);
           
           for(i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
           {
                if((s[i]==' ') && s[i+1]=='8' && (s[i+2]==' ' || s[i+2]=='\0'))
                {
                           m++;
                           if(i!=0)
                           {
                                   i++;
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           
                           s1[m]='a';
                           s1[m+1]='t';
                           s1[m+2]='e';
                           m+=2;
                           
                }
                else if( (s[i]==' ') && s[i+1]=='w' && s[i+2]=='8' && (s[i+3]==' ' || s[i+3]=='\0'))
                {
                          m++;
                          if(i!=0)
                           {
                               i+=2;   
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           else
                           i++;
                          s1[m]='w';
                          s1[m+1]='a';
                          s1[m+2]='i';
                          s1[m+3]='t';
                          m+=3;
                }
                else if((s[i]==' ') && s[i+1]=='g' && s[i+2]=='r' && s[i+3]=='8' && (s[i+4]==' ' || s[i+4]=='\0'))
                {
                     m++;
                     if(i!=0)
                           {
                                 i+=3;
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           else
                           i+=2;
                     s1[m]='g';
                     s1[m+1]='r';
                     s1[m+2]='e';
                     s1[m+3]='a';
                     s1[m+4]='t';
                     m+=4;
                }
                else if((s[i]==' ') && s[i+1]=='4' && (s[i+2]==' ' || s[i+2]=='\0'))
                {
                           m++;
                           if(i!=0)
                           {
                                   i++;
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           s1[m]='f';
                           s1[m+1]='o';
                           s1[m+2]='r';
                           m+=2;
                }
                else if((s[i]==' ') && s[i+1]=='b' && s[i+2]=='4' && (s[i+3]==' ' || s[i+3]=='\0'))
                {
                     m++;
                     if(i!=0)
                           {
                                 i+=2;
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           else
                           i++;
                     s1[m]='b';
                     s1[m+1]='e';
                     s1[m+2]='f';
                     s1[m+3]='o';
                     s1[m+4]='r';
                     s1[m+5]='e';
                     m+=5;
                }
                else if(i==0 && s[i]=='8' && (s[i+1]==' ' || s[i+1]=='\0'))
                {
                         m++;
                           if(i!=0)
                           {
                                   i++;
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           
                           s1[m]='a';
                           s1[m+1]='t';
                           s1[m+2]='e';
                           m+=2;
                }
                else if(i==0 && s[i]=='w' && s[i+1]=='8' && (s[i+2]==' ' || s[i+2]=='\0'))
                {
                         m++;
                          if(i!=0)
                           {
                               i+=2;   
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           else
                           i++;
                          s1[m]='w';
                          s1[m+1]='a';
                          s1[m+2]='i';
                          s1[m+3]='t';
                          m+=3;
                }
                else if(i==0 && s[i]=='g' && s[i+1]=='r' && s[i+2]=='8' && (s[i+3]==' ' || s[i+3]=='\0'))
                {
                         m++;
                     if(i!=0)
                           {
                                 i+=3;
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           else
                           i+=2;
                     s1[m]='g';
                     s1[m+1]='r';
                     s1[m+2]='e';
                     s1[m+3]='a';
                     s1[m+4]='t';
                     m+=4;
                }
                else if(i==0 && s[i]=='4' && (s[i+1]==' ' || s[i+1]=='\0'))
                {
                            m++;
                           if(i!=0)
                           {
                                   i++;
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           s1[m]='f';
                           s1[m+1]='o';
                           s1[m+2]='r';
                           m+=2;
                }
                else if(i==0 && s[i]=='b' && s[i+1]=='4' && (s[i+2]==' ' || s[i+2]=='\0'))
                {
                           m++;
                     if(i!=0)
                           {
                                 i+=2;
                               s1[m]=' ';
                              m++;
                           }
                           else
                           i++;
                     s1[m]='b';
                     s1[m+1]='e';
                     s1[m+2]='f';
                     s1[m+3]='o';
                     s1[m+4]='r';
                     s1[m+5]='e';
                     m+=5;
                }
                else 
                {
                     m++;
                     s1[m]=s[i];
                }
               
           }
            s1[m+1]='\0';
                puts(s1);
                m=-1;
    }
}
